Responsibilities Under the direction of the Manager and IS Operations Lead, this co-op student will be responsible for: • First level technical support for all FortisBC personal computing and related equipment. • Perform upgrades, installations, and preventive maintenance tasks. • Loading and configuring of laptops and desktops for end user deployment. • Update corporate software records and documentation. • Provide support to the IS project teams. Action user support requests. • Job Requirements Requirements • Enrolled in a Computer Information Systems or equivalent program. • Enrolled in a Co-op program. • Microsoft experience. • Network infrastructure training - Cisco. • IP telephony training. • Valid driver's license Additional Information This is a full-time temporary student co-op opportunity with an 8 month term starting in May 2026.
